meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be processed.
meanings.sent1: The processibility of the data made it easy to analyze.
meanings.sent2: The processibility of the fabric allowed for smooth sewing.
meanings.sent3: The processibility of the dough made baking cookies a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The processibility of information in our brains is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The processibility of the instructions was crucial for completing the task efficiently.

meanings.definition: The ability to undergo a series of actions or steps to achieve a desired result.
meanings.sent1: The processibility of the project made it manageable.
meanings.sent2: The processibility of the plan ensured its successful execution.
meanings.sent3: The processibility of the puzzle kept us entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: The processibility of the problem-solving approach was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The processibility of the steps was key to reaching the goal on time.
